attributes.action: A petition so that Northern Ireland is also put in lockdown with mainland UK
attributes.additional_details: We are just a small island of mainland UK, but we are still UK...to not be included in any UK lockdown would be total abandonment. We cannot be left to fend for ourselves
attributes.background: To also include Northern Ireland in their UK lockdown

rejection.details:
The Northern Ireland Executive is responsible for making decisions about the response to coronavirus in Northern Ireland.

You could raise this with your MLA, who represents you in the Northern Ireland Assembly. Details of how to find out who your MLA is are available here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
